arts.sum: There was a lot of negativity surrounding Leeds United after the loss to Fulham. The Whites had a bit of optimism returning from the international break, but the trip to London was a setback. Leeds went into the Wolves game under a bit of pressure. arts.ttl: “I shut them up!” – Calvert-Lewin scores first Leeds goal to silence Wolves fans in huge 3-1 Win
arts.sum: Leeds United forward Dominic Calvert-Lewin scored his first goal for the club in their 3-1 win over Wolves at Molineux. The England striker answered some of his critics back with the sumptuous goal, and some of his detractors were in the stands today. arts.ttl: “It’s a dream come true!” – Okafor’s stunning goal sends Leeds United to Premier League 3-1 triumph over Wolves
arts.sum: Leeds United fought back from a goal down to produce a remarkable performance to beat Wolves 3-1 at Molineux earlier today, with three of their new signings getting on the scoresheet. Daniel Farke’s side conceded an early goal to Wolves, and for a side that hadn’t scored from open play in the Premier League, that […] The post “It’s a dream come true!” – Okafor’s stunning goal sends Leeds United to Premier League 3-1 triumph over Wolves appeared first on The Leeds Press.

arts.ttl: Leeds end goal drought with first-half blitz to leave sorry Wolves pointless
arts.sum: The dozens of Wolves supporters that stuck around until the final whistle on a grim afternoon in the Graham Hughes Stand, draped in sodden ponchos and exposed to the elements, was an image indicative of the mood here. For Vítor Pereira’s side, a fifth straight league defeat, this one against Leeds, for whom Noah Okafor, Anton Stach and Dominic Calvert-Lewin registered their first goals, the latter scoring for the only second time in 12 months. Wolves, jeered off at full time, remain pointless, bottom of the pile and in an ominous position. Of the five other teams to lose their opening five Premier League matches, three finished bottom, the anomaly from that pack the Crystal Palace side Roy Hodgson rescued in 2017-18 after a disastrous start under Frank de Boer. arts.ttl: Leeds come from behind to inflict another loss on rock-bottom Wolves
arts.sum: Leeds 3-1 Wolves: Dominic Calvert-Lewin equalised for the hosts before Leeds flipped the game on its head before half-time

arts.ttl: THREE Leeds summer signings score first goals to beat Wolves
arts.sum: Three Leeds summer signings scored vital first goals for the club as Daniel Farke's side came from behind to win 3-1 at Wolves, who remain rooted to the bottom of the table on zero points.

arts.ttl: Dave Edwards names the one Wolves player who must start against Leeds United
arts.sum: Wolves face Leeds United on Saturday afternoon, and Vitor Pereira could have some selection headaches, but Molineux legend Dave Edwards believes one player should definitely start. Dave Edwards has said that Vitor Pereira must start Ladislav Krejci when Wolves host Leeds United on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Expert baffled at Leeds’ £15M decision vs Wolves
arts.sum: Leeds United spent close to £100million this summer, with a chunk of it going to the defence and the midfield. The lack of investment in attacking areas seems to have angered fans over the past few weeks.
